tool_description: API that gathers Azure security stories from around the web
name: Azure News
title: Azure News

api_list.name: Get All Azure Security News
api_list.description: This end point will return news about Azure Security from all over the web.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://azure-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "azure-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://azure-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "azure-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
